actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Treasury to mint coins in commemoration of the bicentennial of the Library of Congress.
short_title: Library of Congress Bicentennial Commemorative Coin Act of 1996

summary.text: Library of Congress Bicentennial Commemorative Coin Act of 1996 - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to mint and issue one-dollar silver coins and half-dollar clad coins emblematic of the Library of Congress. Requires payment of coin sale surcharges to the Library of Congress Trust Fund Board to support Library activities.

titles.title: Library of Congress Bicentennial Commemorative Coin Act of 1996
A bill to require the Secretary of the Treasury to mint coins in commemoration of the bicentennial of the Library of Congress.
